distinct
from t_order_succes
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order_succes (uuid, company_id, version_no, batch_no, address, order_id, longgitude, latitude, encrypt, license_id, driver_phone, vehicle_no, distribute_time, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longgitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_order_succes set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_no = #{versionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longgitude = #{longgitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypt = #{encrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license_id = #{licenseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_no = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribute_time = #{distributeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.order_id, a.license_id, a.vehicle_no, c.dep_time as park_time, c.dep_longgitude, c.dep_latitude, b.dep_time as arrive_time, b.dest_longgitude, b.dest_latitude, b.driver_mile, b.driver_time, d.positionNum FROM t_order_succes a INNER JOIN t_depart c on a.order_id = c.order_id INNER JOIN t_arrive b on a.order_id = b.order_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT count(1) AS positionNum,order_id FROM t_position_gk GROUP BY order_id ) d on a.order_id = d.order_id WHERE a.uuid not in ('1','2')
and a.order_id = #{orderId}
